price: 158. And whether you die, or are killed, verily, unto Allâh you shall be gathered.
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna
